name: Joined Together in Caves
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------I sorry that you can't play my game in browser, but I had problems with uploading my game using WebGL. I hope that you understand me and play my game although you have to download it first. Thank you :)                                                     ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is my Game for the #gmtk Game Jam 2021.

The Theme is "Joined Together".

You play 2 Characters at the same time, each having a different course. 

I only had 1.5 days, so I couldn't make more levels, but these I made, I put a lot of affort in them. 

Please consider to comment your thoughts about this little game so I can improve as a game developer.

Thank you!

Have Fun! :)
